actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 23 of title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount which may be paid under such chapter to cover the burial and funeral expenses of certain deceased veterans.

summary.text: Increases from $250 to $500 the burial and funeral expense allowance which may be paid by the Veterans' Administration on behalf of certain deceased veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 23 of title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount which may be paid under such chapter to cover the burial and funeral expenses of certain deceased veterans.
